scripts.startDB: echo "Remember!!! This script will only work on Mac!!!! Manage by your mongodb server by your own in other OSs" && echo "Config at /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf" && brew services start mongodb
scripts.stopDB: echo "Remember!!! This script will only work on Mac!!!! Manage by your mongodb server by your own in other OSs" && brew services stop mongodb
scripts.statusDB: echo "Remember!!! This script will only work on Mac!!!! Manage by your mongodb server by your own in other OSs" && brew services list mongodb
scripts.clean: node scripts/cross-rm.js -rf node_modules docs logs/* logs/.*audit*
scripts.production: yarn audit && cross-env NODE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=prod node src/index.js
scripts.reinstall: node scripts/cross-rm.js -rf node_modules && yarn install && yarn audit
scripts.jsdoc: node scripts/cross-rm.js -rf docs && mkdir docs && jsdoc src -d docs
